mapper.select: SELECT Count(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CATEGORY = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT b.board_No, b.emp_No, b.modifiedDate, b.content, b.createdDate, b.title, b.hits, e.emp_Name FROM BOARD b LEFT JOIN EMP e ON b.emp_No = e.emp_No WHERE b.BOARD_CATEGORY = 1 ORDER BY b.board_No desc ) a ) WHERE rn >= #{start} AND rn <= #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET Hits = Hits + 1 WHERE board_No = #{board_No} AND BOARD_CATEGORY = 1
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_No, b.emp_No, b.modifiedDate, b.content, b.createdDate, b.title, b.hits, e.emp_Name FROM BOARD b LEFT JOIN EMP e ON b.emp_No = e.emp_No WHERE b.board_No = #{board_No} AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET modifiedDate = sysdate, content = #{content}, title = #{title} WHERE board_No = #{board_No} AND BOARD_CATEGORY = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, EMP_NO, MODIFIEDDATE, CONTENT, CREATEDDATE, TITLE, BOARD_CATEGORY, HITS ) VALUES ( board_seq.nextval, #{emp_No}, sysdate, #{content}, sysdate, #{title}, 1, #{hits} )
